abstract: 'He died while I was giving him a shave'.
description: Terry Melvin recalls a cathartic event from his youth, when he travelled as a university student to India. In Calcutta, he worked in a hospice for the dying and destitute and tells of the experiences that have shaped and haunted the person his is today.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2002004; Digital Storytelling workshop : general public (September 2007); Active; 2007
